headline: ROTATION ENGINE FIRST CYCLE: Economy-wide scan of 42 candidates confirms pipeline. Zero new promotions. Two kills (K-008 dental, K-009 consulting). Three-layer framework validated. Execution urgency intensifies.
engine_status: CONFIRMATORY -- Rotation engine validates existing pipeline as best available
engine_phase: Phase 2 -- Execution Support (rotation engine confirms, analysis phase conclusive)

recent_signals.headline: ROTATION ENGINE: Systematic 6-channel economy scan -- 42 candidates screened, 25 quick kills, 0 new INVESTIGATE. Pipeline VALIDATED.
recent_signals.systemic_pattern: The Business Rotation Engine's first cycle scanned the full US economy across 6 channels: Baumol inversion, kill re-scan, physical ops complexity, VC anti-portfolio, regulatory de-exclusivity, and failure archaeology. After rigorous filtering: 25 quick kills (Baumol artifacts in tech/finance, regulatory moats, extreme density), 12 parks, 3 subsumes, 2 new kills. ZERO new opportunities promoted to INVESTIGATE_FURTHER. The systematic scan found NOTHING more promising than Customer Support PURSUE.

recent_signals.headline: THREE-LAYER VALIDATION: 0 of 7 killed opportunities rescued by service-layer re-scan. Customer Support and Vet sparsity findings CONFIRMED as genuine.
recent_signals.systemic_pattern: All 7 killed opportunities (K-001 through K-007) re-scanned through the three-layer competitive framework. None have a genuinely sparse AI-native service layer. K-001 (healthcare): regulatory blocks regardless. K-002-K-006: all layers saturated. K-007 (engineering): theoretical gap but PE license blocks. The 0% rescue rate proves Customer Support (<$500M) and Vet (<$100M) sparsity findings are not analytical artifacts -- they are genuine exceptions in the economy.

recent_signals.headline: CROSS-DOMAIN: Failure archaeology validates IO propagation chain -- Zirtual (2015) proves Customer Support is the correct entry point in the sequence.
recent_signals.systemic_pattern: Failed startups (Homejoy, Washio, Shyp, Zirtual) all attempted coordination-cost businesses starting at the HARD end (physical ops, semi-digital). The IO propagation chain from Cycle 10 predicts digital-pure first (customer support), then semi-digital (admin/VA), then physical (cleaning/logistics). Zirtual's VA failure on human costs is structurally identical to the Customer Support thesis -- AI inverts the cost structure. Historical failures validate the correct entry sequence.
recent_signals.source: Cross-Domain Synthesis (Failure Archaeology x IO Propagation)

recent_signals.headline: EXECUTION URGENCY: 10-16 month window vs 12 month minimum execution timeline. Every week of delay is material. Must begin IMMEDIATELY.
recent_signals.systemic_pattern: Agent B's tighter window estimate (10-16 months from Feb 2026) means earliest close is December 2026. Building MVP + first customer takes 3 months, scaling to 5-8 clients takes 6 months, demonstrating margins takes 3 months = 12 months minimum. The margin between window and execution timeline is dangerously thin. Analysis phase is COMPLETE. Execution phase must begin NOW.

recent_signals.headline: CROSS-CHANNEL: Rotation engine de-exclusivity scanner independently flags vet services. Second independent discovery method confirms opportunity.
recent_signals.systemic_pattern: The regulatory de-exclusivity channel (Channel 5) identified veterinary services via DVM license barrier without any input from the existing pipeline. This is the second independent method to flag vet services (first: bottom-up sector screen, Cycle 7). Cross-channel validation from a systematic economy-wide scan strengthens conviction.

recent_signals.headline: K-008 (Dental Practice Ops) and K-009 (Boutique Consulting) KILLED. Two parked opportunities escalated. Pipeline cleanup.
recent_signals.systemic_pattern: K-008 Dental: Three-layer confirms all layers occupied (Dentrix tool, DSO service, Pearl AI-native). 38-state regulatory barrier. K-009 Consulting: Cycle 12 deadline reached with no standardized vertical identified. $10B+ across all layers. Most competitive AI thesis in existence. Both escalated from PARKED per established deadlines. Total kills now: 9.

recent_signals.headline: RISK MONITORING: R-001 (Sierra), R-002 (autonomous agents), R-003 (Mars/Archy) -- NO trigger events. All unchanged.
recent_signals.systemic_pattern: Web tools unavailable limits real-time monitoring confidence. Based on domain knowledge: Sierra AI maintains enterprise/tool positioning (R-001 at 10-15%). Autonomous agents improving incrementally but Klarna reversal still strongest precedent (R-002 at 20-30%). Mars continues practice acquisition, no Archy acquisition known (R-003 at 15-25%). All risk levels unchanged from Cycle 10.

recent_signals.headline: METHODOLOGY: Baumol scanner has systematic tech/finance bias. True stored energy requires credential-barrier filter.
recent_signals.systemic_pattern: Baumol channel's top picks (electronic manufacturing 4.40x, investment banking 3.82x) are all quick-killed because high pay reflects talent competition, not Baumol cost disease. True stored energy exists where wages rose due to REGULATORY PROTECTION (credential barriers). The Baumol x De-exclusivity intersection is more accurate than either channel alone. Recommend adding credential-barrier filter for Cycle 12 rotation.

recent_signals.headline: CROSS-DOMAIN: P-010 BPO Inversion Barrier is domain-specific -- most powerful in digital services, irrelevant for physical ops.
recent_signals.systemic_pattern: Physical ops failed startups (Homejoy, Cherry, Washio) died on unit economics BEFORE reaching scale where inversion barriers matter. For digital services (customer support), unit economics work at small scale so the BPO inversion barrier becomes the PRIMARY competitive advantage. P-010 is a digital-services pattern, not universal.
recent_signals.source: Cross-Domain Synthesis (Physical Ops x P-010 x Failure Archaeology)

recent_signals.headline: ROTATION ENGINE CHANNEL QUALITY: De-exclusivity and Failure Archaeology highest value. Baumol and VC Anti-Portfolio need calibration.
recent_signals.systemic_pattern: Channel assessment: Baumol (0/10 viable, tech/finance bias), Kill Re-scan (0 rescued but framework validated), Physical Ops (confirms existing parks), VC Anti-Portfolio (0 viable, same bias), Regulatory De-exclusivity (cross-validated vet, found medical coding/court reporting niches), Failure Archaeology (strongest analytical insight -- Zirtual validates thesis). Recommend weighting channels 5-6 higher for Cycle 12.

opportunity_rankings.name: Customer Support Vacuum Filler -- Managed Hybrid Human+AI
opportunity_rankings.key_insight: Rotation engine economy-wide scan confirms: NOTHING more promising exists. Failure archaeology validates IO propagation chain entry point. Three-layer framework validated with 0% false positive rate. EXECUTE NOW.

opportunity_rankings.name: Veterinary Services -- Agentic Practice Operations
opportunity_rankings.key_insight: Cross-channel validation: rotation engine de-exclusivity channel independently flagged vet services. Second independent discovery method. Customer discovery is the ONLY remaining blocker to PURSUE.

opportunity_rankings.name: Wholesale Trade AI Broker -- NAICS 425120
opportunity_rankings.key_insight: Cycle 12 is HARD DEADLINE. Customer discovery with chemical brokers OR PARK. No new evidence from rotation engine.

cycle_summary.key_achievement: Rotation engine VALIDATES existing pipeline. Economy-wide scan finds nothing better. Three-layer framework confirmed with 0% kill rescue rate. Analysis phase COMPLETE. Execution urgency critical.

rotation_engine_summary.outcome: CONFIRMATORY -- validates existing pipeline, no new promotions
rotation_engine_summary.calibration_needed: Baumol credential-barrier filter, VC density data validation
